item.title: Justin Baldoni Plans To Sue Blake Lively Over Sexual Harassment Allegations During It Ends With Us Filming
item.description: It Ends With Us’Justin Baldoni plans to sue Blake Lively over accusations about sexual harassment and launching a smear campaign against her.

item.title: 3 Years On, I’m Still So Sad About How Little We Saw One Of DC’s Coolest Movie Suits
item.description: DC has debuted some incredible super suits in its live-action movies, but I'm still sad that one of the best ones ever made featured so little.

item.title: 10 Most Powerful Maiar In The Lord Of The Rings, Ranked
item.description: There are dozens of Maiar in Tolkien's legendarium, but they weren't all equally as powerful. Which in Lord of the Rings ranks the highest?
